title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Integrating Technical Skills for Non-Native English Teacher Candidates

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and expertise in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Within 8 weeks, learners share and implement collaborative teaching improvement strategies with peer teachers ≥3 times via Facebook group activities
Produce and present ≥2 analyses of personal English class situations using Photovoice methodology
Establish self-directed language learning plans and practice ≥10 hours/month using technology-based tools (apps, online resources)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
